Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
13.01.2014 GB SCR18621 Added button Delete Documents
19.12.2013 SH SCR18565 Changed IBAN/Bankaccount number on screen, removed BankID and
extended SQL search for payments and drafts (also done in parts where CSV files are created)
13.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
05.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURR by CURA
27.04.2011 GB SCR16397 Replaced the GNRL_SCANNINGOFPAYMENTDOCS by
GSBU_YESNO (2005)
03.03.2011 GB SCR15757 Replaced the logic to retrieve the radio button labels
via LinkQuery on table COCO by program GB306
22.02.2011 GB SCR16223 Added new test If administration number is > 0 then also
client number must be > 0
10.01.2011 GB SCR16055 Added the button Excel
19.01.2010 GB SCR15231 Extended the Search algorithm
04.03.2008 SH SCR13432 Added HYPB_DELETEAFTERSCAN = 'Y'
03.03.2008 SH SCR9302 Reduced argument list of GM100
08.11.2007 SH SCR12865 Changed GM100.PI.NUMBEROFSCREENS to TRUE
26.07.2007 SH SCR11925 Adjusted argument list of client selection program
14.07.2006 SH SCR11363 Fixed bug with auto. position on button "Statement" if
a client number is entered
10.05.2006 SH SCR11167 Move cursor on button "Statement" if a client number is
14.02.2006 SH SCR10397 Added new HYPB fields
22.08.2005 AK SCR8893 conditionally enable Button "New scan"
06.04.2005 SH SCR8055 Button "Statement" on selection screen -->
changed condition to enable button and call OPH203A instead of
05.04.2005 SH SCR8011 Added new part: Drafts
25.11.2004 EE SCR# 7398 added fields on screen for cheques
29.09.2004 SH SCR7095 Fixed bug "search for cheques" without matches
22.09.2004 SH SCR6881 Leave result screens and start them directly again if
button 'New scan' was pressed; Transaction has to be closed after storing HYPB
24.08.2004 SH SCR6881 Added new button "New Scan" to both result screens
on 6.8.2004 WJ SCR6716 add displaying of hourglass
10.05.2004 SH SCR6185 Extended CND to perform GM101 with "and BADP_INTERCREDIT=Y
15.04.2004 EE SCR#5988 solved problem with large window
07.04.2004 EE SCR#5883 changed table as child window
12.01.2004 SCR5200 changed function 'HOW BOOKED' for cheques
on 16.9.2003 SCR4160 implemented by Jin
27.05.2003 BT SCR3540 Add Button and functionality cor Clear SCREEN
(handler refresh)
06.05.2003 SH SCR3449 Searchresult payments: If button "How bookwd" was pressed
- OPH202E or OPH101C or GM101 has to be called now
03.04.2003 SH 3245 Add check that to amount must be >= from amout and fill
- to amount auto. with from amount
24.03.2003 RR -> SCR3195 Implementation of shortcut handling
30.01.2003 SCR1793 SH/RR Add argument to GM100 (see SPECS)
16.09.2002 SCR2184 Removed table BDPD from DSQL for payments because
- with the old logik BADP_ID = BDPD_BADP_ID only BADP rows with
- releated BDPD rows were selected in the searchresult
04.09.2002 SH Search with negativ amounts and decimals is working now
- therefore we have to convert the numeric amount into alpha and replace
- the ',' against the '.'
13.08.2002 SCR1940 SH Serach with negativ amounts now possible
-- INFO: If negativ amounts were entered we can only check without decimals
because the decimalseparator will be send as ',' to DSQL instead of '.' and
it's only possible to send negativ amounts as string (-999,00) as DSQL because
the gateway do not matched the numeric value in a correct form, maybe the
negaitv sign behind the amount, instead in front of the amount, will be send to
17.07.2002 SCR1691 SH Add new field in task "Search Results Payments"
- vv.BADP_DAILYRUNNUMBER. Used as argument to call OPH106C
28.06.2002 JJ Added large table if number of description lines >5
13.06.2002 JJ droped last (empty) par from call GM100 from SrchRes Cheques
11.06.2002 JJ SCR1445 added document buttons + calls GM100 to result screens
21.05.2002 SH SCR1306 Removed PART "Obtain CLBD to get BANKID/ACCOUNT for
- paymentsearch and a tests to BADP_ADMNOINITIAL/CLNTNOINITIAL for paymentsearch
- if ADMNO and CLNTNO were entered in searchscreen
SCR#588 17.01.2001 OK (diff. bugs and new requirements)
SCR#918 26.02.2002 SH (removed function 'Search with free text)
-- only relevant for paymentsearch, if ADMNO and CLNTNO filled there is also a
-- test for BADP_ADMNOINITIAL and BADP_CLNTNOINITIAL
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
-- Call search screen, if button "New scan" was pressed in one of the result
screen, transaction has to be closed, if an new HYPB was stored, in this case
the result screens have to be directly opened without entering search
criterias
.. if client number is selected/entered psition cursor on button "Statement"
which allows the users to press key "Enter"
-- Leave task directly and call search results, see T.S., if button "New scan"
was pressed in one of the serach screens
-- Store entered Searchcriterias for the next search
-- Payment search
-- Cheque search
-- Draft search
-- Validation Adminstration_Number
-- Validation If administration number is >0 then also client number must be >0

-- Validation Currency
-- Validation Amounts

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DISTINCT BADP_ID, BADP_BANK_ADMNO, BADP_BANK_LEDG_NO, BADP_DATDAILYSTATEMENT, BADP_BANKID, BADP_BANKACCOUNT, BADT_IBAN, BADP_BANKIDDEBTOR, BADP_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR, BADP_IBAN, BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR, BADP_BANK_CURRENCY, BADP_ADMNOINITIAL, BADP_CLNTNOINITIAL, BADP_LEDGER, BADP_BTCP_BTCH_ID, BADP_BTCP_LINENO, BADP_HYPA_ID, BADP_HYPA_DEPARTMENTNAME,BADP_DAILYRUNNUMBER, BADP_REPA_JOURNALNO, BADP_INTERCREDIT FROM :1 join :13/BADT on BADT_BANK_ADMNO = BADP_BANK_ADMNO and BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO = BADP_BANK_LEDG_NO and BADT_BANKID = BADP_BANKID and BADT_BANKACCOUNT = BADP_BANKACCOUNT and BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT = BADP_DATDAILYSTATEMENT and BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER = BADP_DAILYRUNNUMBER and (BADT_IBAN = ':14' or ':14'='') where :11 (BADP_BANKID = :2 or :2=0) and (BADP_BANKACCOUNT = ':3' or ':3'='') and (BADP_DATDAILYSTATEMENT between ':4' and ':5' ) and (BADP_BANKIDDEBTOR = :6 or :6=0) and (BADP_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR = ':7' or ':7'='' ) and (BADP_IBAN = ':15' or ':15'='' ) and (BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR between :8 and :9) and (BADP_BANK_CURRENCY = ':10' or ':10'='') and exists(select * from :13/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = BADP_BANK_ADMNO and ADMU_ALLOW_QUERY_BANK = 'Y' and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':12') order by BADP_DATDAILYSTATEMENT for fetch only

Text.val: -- restart task, to close transaction
... update related BADP row
on 2.9.2003 SCR4160 implemented by Jin
-- no BADT-row found
How Booked
1: small table, don't close screen
2: small table, immediate exit, close screen
3: Large table, no exit, close screen
close small table screen
open large table
reopen small table, without parking
Lines <=5 small parkable table
Not called from RM, count and show without parking

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DISTINCT CHQE_ID, CHQU_UNITDATE,BANK_BANKID, BANK_MAINACCOUNT, BANK_IBAN, CHQE_BANKIDDEBTOR, CHQE_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR, CHQE_AMOUNTCURRCHEQUE, CHQU_CURRENCY, CHQE_ADMNO, CHQE_CLNTNO, CHQU_BANK_LEDG_NO, CHQE_BTCP_BTCH_ID, CHQE_BTCP_LINENO, CHQE_HYPA_ID, CHQE_HYPA_DEPARTMENTNAME, CHQE_REPA_JOURNALNO FROM :1 where CHQE_CHQU_ID = CHQU_ID and (CHQE_ADMNO = :2 or :2=0) and (CHQE_CLNTNO = :3 or :3=0) and (CHQE_BANKIDDEBTOR = :4 or :4=0 ) and (CHQE_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR = ':5' or ':5'='') and (CHQE_AMOUNTCURRCHEQUE between :6 and :7 ) and (CHQU_UNITDATE between ':8' and ':9' ) and (CHQU_CURRENCY = ':10' or ':10'='') and (BANK_ADMNO = CHQU_BANK_ADMNO) and (BANK_LEDG_NO = CHQU_BANK_LEDG_NO) and CHQU_BANK_ADMNO = ADMU_ADMNO and ADMU_ALLOW_QUERY_BANK = 'Y' and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':11' order by CHQU_UNITDATE

Text.val: 12.01.2004 SCR5200 changed function 'HOW BOOKED' for cheques
-- restart task, to close transaction
... update related CHQE row
How Booked

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DISTINCT DRFT_ID, DRFT_BANK_ADMNO, DRFT_BANK_LEDG_NO, DRFT_ENTRYDATE, DRFT_BANK_ID_DEBTOR, DRFT_BANKACCOUNT_DEBTOR, DRFT_IBAN_DEBTOR, DRFT_AMOUNTCURRDRAFT, DRFT_CURRENCY, DRFT_ADMNO, DRFT_CLNTNO, DRFT_BTCP_BTCH_ID, DRFT_BTCP_LINENO, DRFT_HYPA_ID, DRFT_HYPA_DEPARTMENTNAME, DRFT_REPA_JOURNALNO FROM :1 where :9 (DRFT_ENTRYDATE between ':2' and ':3' ) and (DRFT_BANK_ID_DEBTOR = :4 or :4=0) and (DRFT_BANKACCOUNT_DEBTOR = ':5' or ':5'='' ) and (DRFT_IBAN_DEBTOR = ':11' or ':11'='' ) and (DRFT_AMOUNTCURRDRAFT between :6 and :7) and (DRFT_CURRENCY = ':8' or ':8'='') and exists(select * from :12/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = DRFT_BANK_ADMNO and ADMU_ALLOW_QUERY_BANK = 'Y' and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':10') order by DRFT_ENTRYDATE FOR FETCH ONLY

Text.val: -- restart task, to close transaction
... update related DRFT row

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DISTINCT BADP_ID, BADP_BANK_ADMNO, BADP_BANK_LEDG_NO, BADP_DATDAILYSTATEMENT, BADP_BANKID, BADP_BANKACCOUNT, BADT_IBAN, BADP_BANKIDDEBTOR, BADP_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR, BADP_IBAN, BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR, BADP_BANK_CURRENCY, BADP_ADMNOINITIAL, BADP_CLNTNOINITIAL, BADP_LEDGER, BADP_BTCP_BTCH_ID, BADP_BTCP_LINENO, BADP_HYPA_ID, BADP_HYPA_DEPARTMENTNAME,BADP_DAILYRUNNUMBER, BADP_REPA_JOURNALNO, BADP_INTERCREDIT FROM :1 join :13/BADT on BADT_BANK_ADMNO = BADP_BANK_ADMNO and BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO = BADP_BANK_LEDG_NO and BADT_BANKID = BADP_BANKID and BADT_BANKACCOUNT = BADP_BANKACCOUNT and BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT = BADP_DATDAILYSTATEMENT and BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER = BADP_DAILYRUNNUMBER and (BADT_IBAN = ':14' or ':14'='') where :11 (BADP_BANKID = :2 or :2=0) and (BADP_BANKACCOUNT = ':3' or ':3'='') and (BADP_DATDAILYSTATEMENT between ':4' and ':5' ) and (BADP_BANKIDDEBTOR = :6 or :6=0) and (BADP_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR = ':7' or ':7'='' ) and (BADP_IBAN = ':15' or ':15'='' ) and (BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR between :8 and :9) and (BADP_BANK_CURRENCY = ':10' or ':10'='') and exists(select * from :13/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = BADP_BANK_ADMNO and ADMU_ALLOW_QUERY_BANK = 'Y' and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':12') order by BADP_DATDAILYSTATEMENT for fetch only

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Date received')&';'&MlsTrans ('Received on Bankaccount')&';'&MlsTrans ('Received from Bankaccount')&';'&MlsTrans ('Amount received')&';'&MlsTrans ('Curr.')&';'&MlsTrans ('P/C')&';'&MlsTrans ('Admin nr.')

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DISTINCT CHQE_ID, CHQU_UNITDATE,BANK_BANKID, BANK_MAINACCOUNT, BANK_IBAN, CHQE_BANKIDDEBTOR, CHQE_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR, CHQE_AMOUNTCURRCHEQUE, CHQU_CURRENCY, CHQE_ADMNO, CHQE_CLNTNO, CHQU_BANK_LEDG_NO, CHQE_BTCP_BTCH_ID, CHQE_BTCP_LINENO, CHQE_HYPA_ID, CHQE_HYPA_DEPARTMENTNAME, CHQE_REPA_JOURNALNO FROM :1 where CHQE_CHQU_ID = CHQU_ID and (CHQE_ADMNO = :2 or :2=0) and (CHQE_CLNTNO = :3 or :3=0) and (CHQE_BANKIDDEBTOR = :4 or :4=0 ) and (CHQE_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR = ':5' or ':5'='') and (CHQE_AMOUNTCURRCHEQUE between :6 and :7 ) and (CHQU_UNITDATE between ':8' and ':9' ) and (CHQU_CURRENCY = ':10' or ':10'='') and (BANK_ADMNO = CHQU_BANK_ADMNO) and (BANK_LEDG_NO = CHQU_BANK_LEDG_NO) and CHQU_BANK_ADMNO = ADMU_ADMNO and ADMU_ALLOW_QUERY_BANK = 'Y' and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':11' order by CHQU_UNITDATE

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Date received')&';'&MlsTrans ('Received on Bankaccount')&';'&MlsTrans ('Received from Bankaccount')&';'&MlsTrans ('Amount received')&';'&MlsTrans ('Curr.')&';'&MlsTrans ('P/C')&';'&MlsTrans ('Admin nr.')

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DISTINCT DRFT_ID, DRFT_BANK_ADMNO, DRFT_BANK_LEDG_NO, DRFT_ENTRYDATE, DRFT_BANK_ID_DEBTOR, DRFT_BANKACCOUNT_DEBTOR, DRFT_IBAN_DEBTOR, DRFT_AMOUNTCURRDRAFT, DRFT_CURRENCY, DRFT_ADMNO, DRFT_CLNTNO, DRFT_BTCP_BTCH_ID, DRFT_BTCP_LINENO, DRFT_HYPA_ID, DRFT_HYPA_DEPARTMENTNAME, DRFT_REPA_JOURNALNO FROM :1 where :9 (DRFT_ENTRYDATE between ':2' and ':3' ) and (DRFT_BANK_ID_DEBTOR = :4 or :4=0) and (DRFT_BANKACCOUNT_DEBTOR = ':5' or ':5'='' ) and (DRFT_IBAN_DEBTOR = ':11' or ':11'='' ) and (DRFT_AMOUNTCURRDRAFT between :6 and :7) and (DRFT_CURRENCY = ':8' or ':8'='') and exists(select * from :12/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = DRFT_BANK_ADMNO and ADMU_ALLOW_QUERY_BANK = 'Y' and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':10') order by DRFT_ENTRYDATE FOR FETCH ONLY

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Date received')&';'&MlsTrans ('Received on Bankaccount')&';'&MlsTrans ('Received from Bankaccount')&';'&MlsTrans ('Amount received')&';'&MlsTrans ('Curr.')&';'&MlsTrans ('ID')&';'&MlsTrans ('Admin nr.')
